category-def.name: emfviews
category-def.label: EMF Views
category-def.description: Some users only need to see some parts of a model, others have to get the full model extended with data from another model, and others simply access to a combination of information coming from different models. Based on the unquestionable success/usefulness of database views to solve similar problems in databases, EMF Views aims to bring the same concept to the modeling world.
